channel.title: Found a good host to use for RSPS's or homepages!
channel.description:
Hey peoples!
Found this hosting company and thought it was really good value and offered some good features!
Has dedicated server as well as VPS (virtual private server) options.
Even has a free hosting option that can only be used for hosting webpages.
It has 24 hour support and many other features.
Just thought I'd share it with y'all!
Enjoy! *

item.title: Found a good host to use for RSPS's or homepages!
item.dc:creator: @DeltaLegitz DeltaLegitz
item.description:
@DeltaLegitz wrote:

[quote=“ollie123, post:5, topic:323730”][quote author=jis2507 link=topic=420135.msg3086226#msg3086226 date=1262516144]

Sorry but advertising isn’t allowed

LOL it’s not like I own the hosting thing.
I’m just pointing something out that other people might benefit from.
[/quote]

Rofl. GF jis… People just don’t know how to cover themselves… >.<

You lie. The contact email for the website is jis2507@gmail.com. Owned.

And sorry, I don’t believe that ByetHost is your partner.[/quote]

item.title: Found a good host to use for RSPS's or homepages!
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I was going to say, a professional company/organisation would not set php,html codes out this way

<div id="header"> 
<h1>Immortal Web Hosting!</h1> 
<h3> 
<a href="/signup.php"> 
<em>web hosting that lasts forever....</em> 
 
 
 
</h3> 
 
<br><br /> 
<p align=center> 
<a href="/freehosting.php"><img alt="pic" src="images/free_hosting.jpg"border="0" /></a> 
<img alt="space" src="images/spacer.gif"border="0" /> 
<a href="/paidhosting.php"><img alt="pic" src="images/paid.jpg" border="0"/></a> 
<img alt="space" src="images/spacer.gif"border="0" /> 
<a href="/vps.php"><img alt="pic" src="images/vps.jpg"border="0" /></a> 
</p>

Rarely does that happen

Read full topic
